PolicyName.description: The name of the inline policy to delete from the specified IAM role. This parameter allows (per its regex pattern) a string of characters consisting of upper and lowercase alphanumeric characters with no spaces. You can also include any of the following characters: =,.@-

RoleName.description: The name (friendly name, not ARN) identifying the role that the policy is embedded in. This parameter allows (per its regex pattern) a string of characters consisting of upper and lowercase alphanumeric characters with no spaces. You can also include any of the following characters: =,.@-
